mapper.select: select ps.product_size_value productSize, count(pw.product_wish_id) count from product_size ps left join product_wish pw on ps.product_size_id = pw.product_size_id and ps.product_id = #{productId} group by ps.product_size_value
select count(distinct pw.user_id) count from product_wish pw left join (select * from product_size) ps on pw.product_size_id = ps.product_size_id where ps.product_id = #{productId};

select p.product_id productId, pb.product_brand_eng_name productBrandEngName, (select img_thumb_url from img_thumb where productId = product_id limit 1) imgUrl, p.product_eng_name productEngName, pt.tender_price nowBuyPrice, (select count(product_id) from product_deal where productId = product_id) pdCount from product_brand pb join product p on p.product_brand_id = pb.product_brand_id left join (select tender_price, product_id from product_tender pt where tender_flag = 1 order by tender_price asc limit 1) pt on p.product_id = pt.product_id where pb.product_brand_id = #{brandId} and p.product_id != #{currentProductId} order by pdCount desc limit #{limit}

select p.product_id productId, pb.product_brand_eng_name productBrandEngName, (select img_thumb_url from img_thumb it where productId = it.product_id limit 1) imgUrl, p.product_kor_name productKorName, p.product_eng_name productEngName, pt.tender_price nowBuyPrice from product p join product_brand pb on pb.product_brand_id = p.product_brand_id left join (select tender_price, product_id from product_tender pt where tender_flag = 1 order by tender_price asc limit 1) pt on p.product_id = pt.product_id where p.product_eng_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || p.product_kor_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || p.product_model_num like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || pb.product_brand_eng_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || pb.product_brand_kor_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') limit #{startLimit}, #{sizeLimit}

select count(*) from product p join product_brand pb on pb.product_brand_id = p.product_brand_id where p.product_eng_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || p.product_kor_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || p.product_model_num like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || pb.product_brand_eng_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') || pb.product_brand_kor_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
